original_text: And we devoted them to destruction, as we did to Sihon the king of Heshbon, devoting to destruction every city, men, women, and children.
korean_text: 우리가 헤스본 왕 시혼에게 행한 것과 같이 그 성읍들을 멸망시키되 각 성읍의 남녀와 유아를 멸망시켰으나

sentences.original_text: And we devoted them to destruction
as we did to Sihon the king of Heshbon
sentences.korean_translation: 헤스본 왕 시혼에게 행한 것 같이
